channel.title: Need Helping Compiling PI - Mac
channel.description:
Hey everyone, I recently downloaded the source HyBriD Pk and I was trying to compile it by folowing the guides for mac that I had found but every time I end up with the same error and it always doesn't compile which is annoying me to no end.
The response I am getting back from terminal is [code] Unrecognized option: -d Could not create the Java virtual machine. [/code]
or
[code] javac: file not found: srcserverevent*.java Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options [/code]
when I try to use the Javac command. All help will be appreciated.

item.title: Need Helping Compiling PI - Mac
item.dc:creator: @ljoxaa ljoxaa
item.description:
@ljoxaa wrote:

ohh i had the same problem you got to put something like this i dont remember really how -javac -classpath deps//log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps//jython.jar;deps//xstream.jar;deps//mina.jar;deps//mysql.jar;deps//poi.jar;deps//slf4j.jar;deps//slf4j-nop.jar -d bin src\\server\\event\\*.java src\\server\\model\\items\\*.java src\\server\\model\\minigames\\*.java src\\server\\model\\npcs\\*.java src\\server\\model\\objects\\*.java src\\server\\model\\players\\*.java src\\server\\model\\players\\skills\\*.java src\\server\\model\\players\\packets\\*.java src\\server\\model\\shops\\*.java src\\server\\net\\*.java src\\server\\task\\*.java src\\server\\util\\*.java src\\server\\world\\*.java src\\server\\util\\log\\*.java src\\server\\*.java src\\server\\world\\map\\*.java src\\server\\content\\skill\\*.java src\\server\content\\*.java src\\server\\model\\players\\quests\\*.java src\\server\\model\\*.java im not sure but might try

item.title: Need Helping Compiling PI - Mac
item.dc:creator: @Veng4lyfe Veng4lyfe
item.description:
@Veng4lyfe wrote:

I get this result.

javac -classpath deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/jython.jar;deps/xstream.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/poi.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar -d bin src\server\event\*.java src\server\model\items\*.java src\server\model\minigames\*.java src\server\model\npcs\*.java src\server\model\objects\*.java src\server\model\players\*.java src\server\model\players\skills\*.java src\server\model\players\packets\*.java src\server\model\shops\*.java src\server\net\*.java src\server\task\*.java src\server\util\*.java src\server\world\*.java src\server\util\log\*.java src\server\*.java src\server\world\map\*.java src\server\content\skill\*.java src\server\content\*.java src\server\model\players\quests\*.java src\server\model\*.java
javac: no source files
Usage: javac <options> <source files>
use -help for a list of possible options
-bash: deps/jython.jar: Permission denied
-bash: deps/xstream.jar: Permission denied
-bash: deps/mina.jar: Permission denied
-bash: deps/mysql.jar: Permission denied
-bash: deps/poi.jar: Permission denied
-bash: deps/slf4j.jar: Permission denied
-bash: deps/slf4j-nop.jar: Permission denied

item.title: Need Helping Compiling PI - Mac
item.dc:creator: @ljoxaa ljoxaa
item.description:
@ljoxaa wrote:

try to use this one @echo off "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_31\bin\javac.exe" -classpath deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/jython.jar;deps/xstream.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/poi.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar -d bin src\server\event\*.java src\server\model\items\*.java src\server\model\minigames\*.java src\server\model\npcs\*.java src\server\model\objects\*.java src\server\model\players\*.java src\server\model\players\skills\*.java src\server\model\players\packets\*.java src\server\model\shops\*.java src\server\net\*.java src\server\task\*.java src\server\util\*.java src\server\world\*.java src\server\util\log\*.java src\server\*.java src\server\world\map\*.java src\server\content\skill\*.java src\server\content\*.java src\server\model\players\quests\*.java src\server\model\*.java pause cls Compile.bat pause
